summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned during December 2013. It includes instructions for reporting errors and inquiries related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.

There were no service charges or fees incurred during this period.

The account is held at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
